name: Mustang Survival Torrens Jacket - Men's
description: Keep the cold from creeping into your bones. This insulated midlayer is designed for nippy marine environments. Stretchy cuffs create a soft seal at the wrists, with a DWR coating to stop water from trickling in. Its shorter torso length makes for easy layering, and it won't bunch up when you're seated in your craft of choice. The best bit? Light insulation that's toasty, breathable and above all, moisture resistant.Construction combines an outer shell with DWR treatment to shed moisture with a moisture wicking liner.PolarTec® Alpha® insulation is extremely breathable and moisture resistant.Stretch cuffs have a DWR treatment to help seal out water.2 zippered hand pockets and 1 zippered internal pocket.Athletic fit with articulated arms.
